name: UX
summary: Front End Software Architect with experience building and shipping production-grade web applications and strong front end specialization. Deep expertise in modern JavaScript, rapid prototyping, UI architecture,  and design system patterns, with a product-driven mindset. Known for bridging product, design, and engineering to deliver scalable, high-quality user experiences in fast-moving environments. Strong foundation in performance, accessibility, developer experience, and expert in AI-assisted workflows.

workExperience.description:
Introduced AI-assisted development workflows to reduce iteration time while preserving high code quality and design fidelity.
Launched eCommerce web stores allowing business owners to market and sell their products.

Built large-scale, enterprise production web applications, delivering over ten major $4M  enterprise launches.
Took ownership of complex front end systems, translating design and business requirements into maintainable, scalable solutions.
Developed reusable component libraries and front end architecture standards adopted across multiple teams.
Collaborated with back end engineers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless end-to-end user experiences.
Hired and mentored developers through code reviews and hands-on guidance.

Built interactive experiences using custom JavaScript, animation, and CMS-driven content.
Partnered with design teams to refine usability across campaigns.

Developed and maintained client websites using WordPress and Drupal.
Worked directly with clients to translate requirements into functional web solutions.
Taught robotics and introductory programming concepts, led workshops and managed technical inventory for NSF-funded computing education programs.
